data.name: 在这个世界的尽头，你与我被遗忘的传说（In the world end, You and me the forget's legend）
data.detailed_description:
This is a outdated RPG of a hero save the world,but this game has had problems since the beginning.
As the protagonist, you will pass the game in a totally different way, the story must exceed your imagination.
This legend will not be remembered which happened in a world that will eventually be forgotten.

Game features:

  • 3A production level: A year, Alone, Amazing.
  • Unexpected but reasonable stories unfold, hoping to surprise you.
  • Pure game experience, no maze, no farm, you will face 19 BOSS battles.
  • Battles need strategy, and even if you choose the "novice mode", you will still be caught in a bitter battle.
  • The first generation of the "The forgets legend" series, buy it and you will witness the birth of a unique series.

Developer has something to say:

  • My life belongs to the game, so I want to make my own game.
  • I have sought the cooperation of many new teams, but I found that they all have their own ideas, and ultimately I can only come by myself.
  • I have almost no capital and programming knowledge to start with, so I can only choose to use RPGMAKER, as well as the most basic material.
  • I know that these materials have long been commonplace, but I still try my best to play their part./list]
    • I spent a thousand hours making this game and couldn't wait to share it with you.
    • Initially I was planning to release for free, but I realized that if I wanted to make a better game, I had to pay.
    • If you like this game, I hope you can support me and leave a comment.

    Game Cheats:

    • Entering "SKIP" on the tutorial map will skip the tutorial.
    • Entering the Developer's name "ERODAISIKI" will get an artifact.

As the protagonist, you will pass the game in a totally different way, the story must exceed your imagination. This legend will not be remembered which happened in a world that will eventually be forgotten.
data.reviews:
“When I defeated the devil, I thought it was not far from the end of the game. But after that I discovered it was beginning instead of ending.”
9/10 – EGN(Erodaisiki Games Network)

“Although art is its biggest flaw, it is still the greatest one in the series.”
8/10 – ES(Erogame Spot)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

data.legal_notice:
The game is made using RPGMAKER MV and its materials.
The auto-save feature uses the OrangeAutoSave script provided by hudell.
The rest of the project is done by the game author alone.
